price: Mi je objavljujemo kao Kur’an na arapskom jeziku da biste razumjeli,
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
